recipe.title: Special Sauce
ingredients: 1 tablespoon sweet relish or 1 tablespoon dill pickle relish
2 teaspoons adobo sauce from canned chipotle chiles in adobo
Ingredient info: Canned chipotle chiles in adobo are available at better supermarkets and at specialty foods stores and Latin markets.
instructions: Combine ingredients in a medium bowl and serve with burgers. Earn bonus points by bringing a jar to the next cookout.
